About Me

Down to Business

I'm am a human being, a business professional, a hard-worker, and an expert in the art of watercooler topics. (If you're wondering, ask me about it.) While I'm currently a Director of UX/UI with Decisiv, in past lives I've managed and directed the customer-facing web properties for an e-commerce company, been a senior front-end developer, and a graphics designer.

All of these experiences have given me a deep knowledge of technology, a passion for the user, and a data-driven view of how products and technology should be built. To this, I add a stellar work ethic, a great sense of humor, and dedication to getting the job done well & right.
